特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course is currently planned for face-to-face format. Every content lesson will be based on an academic English reading (usually 8 - 15 pages) and consist of an in-person lecture supported by PowerPoint slides and student notetaking. Three lessons will be designated for Unit Tests, and the final lesson will be designated for course review and completion of the Final Writing Assignment.

All course reading and handout materials will be distributed to students via the course LUNA site. Students are expected to access and use electronic course materials on their own. No printed materials will be provided.

[Information for students permitted to take classes online]
Only students who receive permission from the university can take this course online. In such a case, data recorded from face-to-face classes will be broadcast on-demand. Links to the recorded lectures will be provided on the course LUNA site. Students permitted to take classes online are expected to watch on-demand lectures and complete the required assessments according to the course schedule.
